map_grids.​ XPS_MG_typ_HexGrid
map_grids.​XPS_MG_ifc_IGrid
map_grids.​XPS_MG_typ_HexGrid

TypeDefinition

XPS_MG_typ_HexGrid
Authors

Crashdome

Description

Static Methods for calculating indices along a hexagonal grid independant of size. Hexagonal grid uses pointy-top formulas (vs flat-top)

Reserved
#str
"XPS_MG_typ_HexGrid"
@interfaces

XPS_MG_ifc_IGrid

Methods
GetPositionByIndex
call ["GetPositionByIndex",[_cellkey, _size]]

XPS_MG_ifc_IGrid

Paramters
_cellkey

Array - 3-dimensional array of a hex index position - (e.g. [10,15,4])

_size

Number - the radius size of the hex

Returns
_pos

Array - 2-dimensional array of world position

Throws
<XPS_typ_ArgumentNilException>

if parameter was nil

GetIndexByPosition
call ["GetIndexByPosition",[_pos, _size]]

XPS_MG_ifc_IGrid

Paramters
_pos

object or Array - object with a world position -OR- 2-dimensional array of world position

_size

Number - the radius size of the hex

Returns
_cellkey

Array - 3-dimensional array of a hex index position - (e.g. [10,15,4])

Throws
<XPS_typ_ArgumentNilException>

if parameter was nil

GetNearbyIndexes
call ["GetIndexByPosition",[_center, _radius, _includeCenter*]]

XPS_MG_ifc_IGrid

Paramters
_center

Array - 3-dimensional index of the cell in which to start (index - NOT world position)

_radius

Number - the number of hexes to include in terms of radius (in cells)

Optionals
_includeCenter

Boolean - (Default: false) Set True to include the center hex in results

Returns
_hexes

Array - an array of indices of the hexes within the radius supplied

Throws
<XPS_typ_ArgumentNilException>

if parameter was nil

GenerateGrid
call ["GenerateGrid",[_sizeHex,_sizeWorld*]]

XPS_MG_ifc_IGrid

Paramters
_sizeHex

Number - width of hex from center point to center of flat edge in world units

Optionals
_sizeWorld

Number - (Default: worldsize) - width (and height) of the hex grid in world units

Returns
_array

Array - a multidimensional array composed of two elements: [indexes,positions]

- indexes

Array - an array of 3d arrays for indexed position

- positions

Array - an array of 2d arrays for world position

Throws
<XPS_typ_ArgumentNilException>

if parameter was nil
